channel.title: backtesting on Options Cafe
channel.description: Recent content in backtesting on Options Cafe

item.title: Backtesting Options Is Here
item.description: Options Cafe backtester is here. Have you ever wondered how your options trading strategy would perform over time? I have, so I built a backtester. I wanted a way to simulate trading the options market day to day to see how well my strategies would have fared.
